typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PurchaseOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		Status as integer,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		VendorID as integer,
		ShipMethodID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> POH
POH derive(Year = year(OrderDate),
		Quarter = case(month(OrderDate) >= 1 && month(OrderDate) <= 3, 'Q1',
    month(OrderDate) >= 4 && month(OrderDate) <= 6, 'Q2',
    month(OrderDate) >= 7 && month(OrderDate) <= 9, 'Q3', 'Q4'  
),
		Month = month(OrderDate)) ~> YearMonthQuarter
YearMonthQuarter aggregate(groupBy(Year,
		Quarter,
		Month,
		EmployeeID,
		VendorID),
	{Avg(SubTotal)} = avg(SubTotal),
		{Avg(TaxAmt)} = avg(TaxAmt),
		{Avg(Freight)} = avg(Freight),
		{Avg(TotalDue)} = avg(TotalDue)) ~> Avg
Avg sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Year,
		Quarter,
		Month,
		EmployeeID,
		VendorID,
		{Avg(SubTotal)},
		{Avg(TaxAmt)},
		{Avg(Freight)},
		{Avg(TotalDue)}
	)) ~> POFactAvg

source(output(
		PurchaseOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		Status as integer,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		VendorID as integer,
		ShipMethodID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> POH
POH derive(Year = year(OrderDate),
		Quarter = case(month(OrderDate) > 4, 'Q1', month(OrderDate) > 7, 'Q2',month(OrderDate) > 10, 'Q3','Q4'),
		Month = month(OrderDate)) ~> YMQ
YMQ filter(Year == 2012) ~> Year2012
Year2012 split(Quarter == 'Q1',
	Quarter == 'Q2',
	Quarter == 'Q3',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitQtr@(Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4)
ConditionalSplitQtr@Q1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> POHQ1
ConditionalSplitQtr@Q2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> POHQ2
ConditionalSplitQtr@Q3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> POHQ3
ConditionalSplitQtr@Q4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> POHQ4

source(output(
		SalesOrderID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		SubTotal as string,
		TaxAmt as string,
		Freight as string,
		TotalDue as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SalesDataJune2021
SalesDataJune2021 split(isNull(toDate(OrderDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ErrorRows, GoodRows)
ConditionalSplit1@ErrorRows derive(FileName = 'SalesData June-2021.csv') ~> SourceFileName1
ConditionalSplit1@GoodRows derive(SalesOrderID = toInteger(SalesOrderID),
		OrderDate = toDate(OrderDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		SubTotal = toDecimal(SubTotal, 10, 2),
		TaxAmt = toDecimal(TaxAmt, 10, 2),
		Freight = toDecimal(Freight, 10, 2),
		TotalDue = toDecimal(TotalDue, 10, 2),
		FileName = 'SalesData June-2021.csv') ~> SourceFileName2
SourceFileName1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SalesDataBR
SourceFileName2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SalesDataGR

source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		EmpName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as string,
		Dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpInfoCSV
EmpInfoCSV sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	stageInsert: true) ~> SnowDB01

source(output(
		EmpID as short,
		EmpName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as short,
		Dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpInfo1
source(output(
		EmpName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as short,
		Dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpInfo2
EmpInfo2 keyGenerate(output(EmpID as long),
	startAt: 7L) ~> EmpID
EmpInfo1, EmpID union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['EmpInfoUnion.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EmpInfo

source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrdersSrc
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrdersTar
OrdersTar select(mapColumn(
		OrderID_Lkp = OrderID,
		CustomerID_Lkp = CustomerID,
		EmployeeID_Lkp = EmployeeID,
		OrderDate_Lkp = OrderDate,
		OrdAmt_Lkp = OrdAmt
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTar
OrdersSrc, SelectTar lookup(OrderID == OrderID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(isNull(OrderID_Lkp)) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> OrdertarSink

source(output(
		PurchaseOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		Status as integer,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		VendorID as integer,
		ShipMethodID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> POH
source(output(
		PurchaseOrderID as integer,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		PurchaseOrderDetailID as integer,
		DueDate as timestamp,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(19,4),
		ReceivedQty as decimal(8,2),
		RejectedQty as decimal(8,2),
		StockedQty as decimal(9,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> POD
source(output(
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		MakeFlag as boolean,
		FinishedGoodsFlag as boolean,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as integer,
		ReorderPoint as integer,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		DaysToManufacture as integer,
		ProductLine as string,
		Class as string,
		Style as string,
		ProductSubcategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		rowguid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Product
POH, POD join(POH@PurchaseOrderID == POD@PurchaseOrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> PurchaseOrderID
PurchaseOrderID select(mapColumn(
		PurchaseOrderID = POH@PurchaseOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		Status,
		EmployeeID,
		VendorID,
		ShipMethodID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		ModifiedDate = POH@ModifiedDate,
		PurchaseOrderID = POD@PurchaseOrderID,
		ModifiedDate = POD@ModifiedDate,
		DueDate,
		OrderQty,
		ProductID,
		UnitPrice,
		LineTotal,
		ReceivedQty,
		RejectedQty,
		StockedQty
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> POHPOD
POHPOD, ProductSelect join(POHPOD@ProductID == ProductSelect@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ProductID
Product select(mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		StandardCost
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ProductSelect
ProductID sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> PurchaseOrderFact

source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Dept as string,
		StartDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> EmpSrcType2
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Dept as string,
		Active as integer,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> EmpTarType2
EmpSrcType2 derive(SrcHashKey = md5(EmpName,Dept)) ~> SrcHashKey
EmpTarType2 derive(TarHashKey = md5(EmpName,Dept)) ~> TarHashKey
SrcHashKey, TarHashKey exists(SrcHashKey == TarHashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DoesNotExists
TarHashKey, SetActive1 exists(EmpTarType2@EmpID == EmpSrcType2@EmpID
	&& EmpTarType2@EmpName == EmpSrcType2@EmpName,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
DoesNotExists derive(Active = 1,
		EndDate = toDate('9999-12-31')) ~> SetActive1
Exists derive(Active = 0,
		EndDate = toDate(currentUTC())) ~> SetActive0
SetActive0 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> UpdateExisting
SetActive1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Dept as string,
		Active as integer,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> EmpTarInsert
UpdateExisting sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Dept as string,
		Active as integer,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['EmpID','EmpName','Dept'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> EmpTarUpdate

source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrdSrc
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrdTar
OrdTar select(mapColumn(
		OrderID_Lkp = OrderID,
		CustomerID_Lkp = CustomerID,
		EmployeeID_Lkp = EmployeeID,
		OrderDate_Lkp = OrderDate,
		OrdAmt_Lkp = OrdAmt
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OrdTarLkp
OrdSrc, OrdTarLkp lookup(OrderID == OrderID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SrcTarCompare
SrcTarCompare alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> UpsertRecords
OrdTar, OrdSrc lookup(OrdTar@OrderID == OrdSrc@OrderID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DsntExistInSrc
DsntExistInSrc alterRow(deleteIf(isNull(OrdSrc@OrderID))) ~> AlterRow1
UpsertRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['OrderID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		EmployeeID,
		OrderDate,
		OrdAmt
	)) ~> UpsertOrdTar
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['OrderID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DeleteFromOrdTar

source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrdSrc
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrdTar
OrdTar select(mapColumn(
		OrderID_Lkp = OrderID,
		CustomerID_Lkp = CustomerID,
		EmployeeID_Lkp = EmployeeID,
		OrderDate_Lkp = OrderDate,
		OrdAmt_Lkp = OrdAmt
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OrdTarLkp
OrdSrc, OrdTarLkp lookup(OrderID == OrderID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SrcTarCompare
SrcTarCompare alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> UpsertRecords
UpsertRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['OrderID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		EmployeeID,
		OrderDate,
		OrdAmt
	)) ~> UpsertOrdTar

source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		EmpName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as string,
		Dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpInfoCSV
EmpInfoCSV derive(Email = concat(EmpName,'@',Dept,'.com')) ~> EmailCol
EmailCol sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['EmpInfoEmail.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EmpInfoEmailCSV

source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		CarrierTrackingNumber as string,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		SpecialOfferID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(38,6),
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SOD
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		MakeFlag as boolean,
		FinishedGoodsFlag as boolean,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as integer,
		ReorderPoint as integer,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		DaysToManufacture as integer,
		ProductLine as string,
		Class as string,
		Style as string,
		ProductSubcategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Product
SOD, SelectProd join(SOD@ProductID == SelectProd@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Product select(mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name,
		StandardCost
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProd
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(ModifiedDate,
		Name),
	ProductCount = count(Name)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 window(over(ModifiedDate),
	desc(ProductCount, true),
	ProductSalesRank = rowNumber()) ~> Window1
Window1 filter(ProductSalesRank <= 3) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DailyProdSales

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> con1Lookup
con1Lookup sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DB01

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Group1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Group2
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Group3
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrdersNorthwind
Group1, Group2, Group3, OrdersNorthwind union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> UnionDB
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['UnionGroup.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GroupUnion

source(output(
		EmpID as short,
		EmpName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as short,
		Dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpInfoCsv
EmpInfoCsv window(asc(EmpID, true),
	RunningTotal = sum(Salary)) ~> Window1
Window1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Partition

source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		EmpName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as string,
		Dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpInfoCsv
EmpInfoCsv window(over(Dept),
	asc(Salary, true),
	SalRank = rank(),
		SalDensRank = denseRank()) ~> Window1
Window1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> PartitionDensRank
Window1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		EmpName,
		Gender,
		Dept,
		Salary
	)) ~> Partition

parameters{
	AdfName as string,
	PipelineName as string,
	TriggerName as string,
	RunID as string,
	TriggerID as string,
	TriggerTime as string,
	TriggerType as string,
	Status as string,
	logFilename as string
}
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Temp
Temp derive(AdfName = $AdfName,
		PipelineName = $PipelineName,
		TriggerName = $TriggerName,
		RunID = $RunID,
		TriggerID = $TriggerID,
		TriggerTime = $TriggerTime,
		TriggerType = $TriggerType,
		Status = $Status) ~> LogColumns
LogColumns select(mapColumn(
		AdfName,
		PipelineName,
		TriggerName,
		RunID,
		TriggerID,
		TriggerTime,
		TriggerType,
		Status
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveTemp
RemoveTemp sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[($logFilename)],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> OpLogFile

parameters{
	AdfName as string,
	PipelineName as string,
	TriggerName as string,
	RunID as string,
	TriggerID as string,
	TriggerTime as string,
	TriggerType as string,
	Status as string,
	logFilename as string
}
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Temp
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[('LogFiles/Logs/' + $logFilename)]) ~> TodaysLogFile
Temp derive(AdfName = $AdfName,
		PipelineName = $PipelineName,
		TriggerName = $TriggerName,
		RunID = $RunID,
		TriggerID = $TriggerID,
		TriggerTime = $TriggerTime,
		TriggerType = $TriggerType,
		Status = $Status) ~> LogColumns
LogColumns select(mapColumn(
		AdfName,
		PipelineName,
		TriggerName,
		RunID,
		TriggerID,
		TriggerTime,
		TriggerType,
		Status
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveTemp
RemoveTemp, TodaysLogFile union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[($logFilename)],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> OpLogFile
